sections.heading: signature, defined.Electronic signature means an electronic sound, symbol, or process attached to or logically associated with a record and executed or adopted by a person with the intent to sign the record

sections.text:
86-621.Electronic signature, defined.

Electronic signature means an electronic sound, symbol, or process attached to or logically associated with a record and executed or adopted by a person with the intent to sign the record.

SourceLaws 2002, LB 1105, ยง 383.
